Experiment 2: Simultaneously learning and using background knowledge

    1. WetSpring ? DrySummer ? FireInFall (stop when 8 of 8 correct)
    • Same as Experiment 1
    2. Feedback given on three concepts simultaneously A ??WetSpring
    B???C ? DrySummmer
    Logical A ? (B???C) ? FireInFall Feature C ? (B ??A) ? FireInFall
    • Measured Trials until 23 of 24 correct on final concept
    • Total number of errors on final concept
